alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 8:42PM EDT until August 12 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Monroe County in east central Ohio... Wetzel County in northern West Virginia... * Until 945 PM EDT. * At 842 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Sistersville, or 11 miles south of Woodsfield, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... New Martinsville, Paden City, Pine Grove, Jacksonburg, Sardis, Smithfield, Fly, Antioch, Graysville, Wileyville, Big Run, Reader, Knob Fork, Porters Falls, Hannibal, and Rinard Mills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
